Linux platform with shell scripting.    Web server technologies like Apache Tomcat.     Desirable Skills :     Knowledge of technologies like C, Perl andor Python.    Client side technologies like HTML, CSS, Javacript, Jquery, BootStrap,Angular.   Mobile development technologies (Android,IOS,Ionic).   Java Frameworks like Spring ,Hibernate , Struts etc.   Proficient with Development Tools like eclipse, git etc.     BE BTechMCA    0-1 year
